sect1.title: What is Advertise
sect1.para: Advertise allows autodiscovery of httpd proxies by the cluster nodes. It is done by sending multicast messages from httpd to the cluster. The httpd specialized module: mod_advertise sends UDP message on a multicast group, both mod_advertise and the cluster listener joined the multicast group and the cluster receives the messages.

The X-Manager-Address header value is used by the cluster logic to send information about the cluster to the proxy. It is the IP and port of the VirtualHost where mod_advertise is configured or URL parameter of the ServerAdvertise directive.
See Proxy Discovery in Configuration Properties and mod_advertise in Apache httpd configuration.

sect1.title: What to do if I don't want to use Advertise (multicast):
sect1.para: In the VirtualHost receiving the MCPM of httpd.conf don't use any Advertise directive or use:

In mod_cluster-jboss-beans.xml add the addresses and ports of the VirtualHost to the proxyList property and set advertise to false, for example:<property name="proxyList">10.33.144.3:6666,10.33.144.1:6666</property>
<property name="advertise">false</property>
